oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait of Charles Alexander Nash
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Reproduction portrait of a period tintype. The original was a hand-tinted photograph of 1st Lt. Charles A. Nash, 97th Tenn. Militia. He was a teamster during the war and a blacksmith in civilian life. Nash was born in 1828 and died in 1909. He was the grandfather of the owner's husband.
